# Antenatal Care Decision Support Tool I'll create an interactive HTML page that implements the antenatal care guideline as a decision-making algorithm. The page will have a two-column layout with questions on the left and dynamic guidance on the right. ```html Antenatal Care Decision Support Tool

Antenatal Care Decision Support Tool

Based on NICE Antenatal Care Guidelines

Assessment Questions

Clinical Guidance

Please select your clinical context and answer the questions to receive personalized guidance.

This tool is based on the NICE Antenatal Care Guideline. It is intended to support clinical decision-making but does not replace professional judgment.

Last updated: Based on NICE guideline published in 2021
